name: Habitat Aid Limited
description:
We can supply whatever you need for habitat restoration or native planting schemes to improve biodiversity.

We supply high quality British native trees, plants, aquatic plants, seeds and heritage fruit trees, which we source through our community of small specialist UK nurseries and growers. 

We have close links to a number of UK conservation charities, to whom we donate half our profits from online sales. Many of these are also clients, including Buglife, the Bumblebee Conservation Trust, British Beekeepers' Association and Butterfly Conservation.

We also increasingly work with corporate clients and landscape and ecology professionals. Corporate clients include the Co-op, Hillier’s Nurseries, Nestle, M&S, Noble Foods and government organizations the Forestry Commission, the Environment Agency and the Highways Agency.
